code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getCurrentUser}from'../services/user';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchUser(){try{const data=await getCurrentUser();setUser(data);}catch(err){setError('Error al cargar datos del paciente');}finally{setLoading(false);}}fetchUser();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center",children:"Cargando..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center text-red-600",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-blue-50 flex flex-col items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-full max-w-2xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:["Bienvenido, ",(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.name)||'Paciente']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["Correo: ",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["Rol: ",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.role]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-2",children:"Aqu\xED podr\xE1s ver y gestionar tus citas, consultar tu historial y editar tu perfil."})]})});};export default Dashboard;
